backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing lease listings, requests, and user profiles with admin/user access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of numerous frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables with light and dark mode color definitions and global style resets.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the frontend app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, layout, and global toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/authGuardCo: Provides shared text for authentication and connection error messages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Displays the logged‑in user's profile name as a badge when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, error handling, and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time authenticated users to save a display name, gated by actor readiness.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard that handles login, actor initialization, timeout states, and error displays before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Incomi: Displays incoming lease requests with actions to accept or reject and handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LeaseO: Dialog for creating or editing lease listings with validation and submit handlers.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OwnerO: Manages an owner's lease listings with options to create, edit, archive, and change availability.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper including top navigation, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Application footer with links, branding, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/leases/EmptyStat: Reusable empty‑state card showing a message and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/leases/LeaseList: Card showing a lease listing’s key details and a link to view full listing info.
frontend/src/components/marketing/GetUni: A marketing section displaying the Unity Network app logo, download badges for iOS and Android, and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/media/YouTubeSho: Renders a grid of embedded YouTube Shorts with titles, descriptions, and links to watch on YouTube.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Top navigation bar with links, authentication controls, and a mobile drawer menu using a sheet component.
frontend/src/components/requests/SubmitL: Form allowing authenticated users to submit lease requests, handling validation, submission, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/requests/TenantR: Displays a table of the user's lease requests with status badges, loading skeletons, and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Combines identity and actor state to determine readiness, detect initialization errors, and provide a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Simple auth helper exposing Internet Identity login state, principal strings, and login/logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and exposes login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseListings.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch public and owner-specific lease listings using an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseRequests.ts: Implements hooks for submitting lease requests, fetching tenant/owner requests, and updating request status.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerDashboard.ts: Contains mutations for creating, updating, archiving lease listings and updating availability, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to load and save the authenticated user's profile using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the authenticated dashboard with tabs for offers, incoming requests, and user requests.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays an informational page explaining how the app works, including steps and ULO lease code details.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero, feature highlights, and link to browse lease listings.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed info for a specific lease listing, including availability, masked code, and request form.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseListingsPage.tsx: Shows sortable list of public lease listings with loading states and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with messaging and link back to home.
frontend/src/utils/leaseAvailability.ts: Utility functions that map lease status to availability metadata and user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/leaseCodeMasking.ts: Masks lease codes for public display by revealing only partial segments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using search, hash, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, and plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project state metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for an ICP-hosted website for UNO lease-code distribution. Defines constraints, mobile-first requirements, admin restrictions, and a list of current bugs affecting authentication, media, and deployment.
